name: AUPrimaryCareCondition
title: AU Primary Care Condition
description: This profile defines a condition structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
purpose: This profile defines a condition structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.

element.comment: Details about a single identified health condition, injury, disability or any other issue which impacts on the physical, mental and/or social well-being of an individual.

element.definition:
The clinical status of the condition.
A data element that records whether the condition is active or inactive.

Estimated or actual date/time the diagnosis or problem was recognised by a healthcare professional.
Partial dates are allowed.
element.comment: The assertedDate represents the date when this particular Condition record was first recognised by the clinician , not the date of the most recent update in terms of when severity, abatement, etc. were specified.
